name: server

scripts.dev: npm run build-client && concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client

author: <josephiusx@gmail.com>
description: use npm not yarn     nvm install 8.1.1     using latest version though 19.7.0     mkdir server     cd server     git init     npm init -y      npm i express :          Lib has helpers to simplify HTTP traffic.
